title: is there a lag problem going on in the live servers?
body: every game i enter i get intense lag issues then it goes down for a few moments and then goes right up and idk if there's a specific issue with the servers :/

replies.body: well now it's only random games i get a bit of ping issues
i have a similar problem. every time i load LoL up it says that there's a pvpv.net problem and i cant connect to the game serveres and im new at this so idk what's going on.
Same here. My ISP and is stable as well as my router connection. My entire team had this that last game. Riot Please look in to this before people start losing points in ranked matches.

Lag spikes are usually due to a connection issue to the game server possibly resulting from instability or packet loss.  My recommendation for your specific issue is to run a [Log Reader ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)to get an overview of your situation.  The results will also provide a set of steps that I hope can help get this fixed for you for good.  Please let me know if you have any questions!
